Paper N.D. 47.)CABINET.NATIONAL AND IMPERIAL DEFENCE SUB-COMMITTEE OF THE COMMITTEE OF IMPERIAL DEFENCE.Note by the Chairman in regard to the Interim Report. (Paper No. CP. 270 (23)).I AM directed by the Sub-Committee to communicate the following resolution to the Cabinet: " The Sub-Committee consider that, consequent on the approval of the Cabinet to the interim report, immediate expenditure will be required under the following principal heads if the scheme of expansion is to be economically and expeditiously initiated : Purchase of land for aerodromes.Additional research.Increase in recruiting machinery.Immediate increases in officers and other ranks.Increases in Air Ministry staff. iThe Committee recommend that the Treasury should be approached with a view to this preliminary expenditure in the course of the present financial year, which, the Committee are informed, should not exceed l,000,OO0Z."SALISBURY.2, Whitehall Gardens, 8.W. 1, 12th June, 1923.18[10135]
